name: Midnight Racing (itch)
description:
Full physics-based 3D Arcade Racing with 4 different minigame modes  and race tracks to play around (Practice, Bowling, Checkpoints and Competitive). This project is based on a quick and simple gamelay for casual fun, enjoy!

Click in the link below to play on your desktop web browser: https://play.unity.com/mg/karting/karting-minigame-10

Donate if you like the game!
